cdist-type__postfix(7)
======================

NAME
----
cdist-type__postfix - Install postfix


DESCRIPTION
-----------
This space intentionally left blank.


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
-------------------
None.


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
-------------------
None.


EXAMPLES
--------

.. code-block:: sh

    __postfix
